Long Term Contract North West Boston  (at least a year)
Java QA Senior Engineer
Details:

This is an excellent opportunity to work with a team comprised of 
the brightest stars in the industry on a major Enterprise 
Application Development Project at a Fortune 500 company who 
currently ranks in the top 150. The Team is headed by a very strong 
J2EE Architect who is a great mentor and a great person to work 
with.  He is also a past placement of mine so I know first hand of 
the skill level on board for this project.

 

Requirements:
** 5-10 years professional Software Quality Assurance Engineering 
experience 

**2+ years Java software engineering experience required 
Working knowledge of application development technologies 
(e.g., editors, compilers, version control systems) 

**Expertise with Extreme Programming, Agile modeling methodologies 
Hands-on experience in building test automation for complex 
enterprise applications using the latest J2EE technologies including 
the JUnit testing framework, Ant and continuous integration with 
CruiseControl

**Win Runner/Quick Test Pro 

**Must have previous experience developing and managing a Java test 
automation infrastructure. 

**Experience with Junit/HTTPUnit,/Cactus required 

**Experience in QA/testing an enterprise application on the J2EE 
platform (WebSphere 4/5, Apache, Tomcat) using JSP/Servlets,and 
JDBC. 

**Experience installing, configuring, and administering DB2, 
databases on the Win32 and UNIX (AIX) and Linux platforms. 

**Unix, Linux and Windows operating systems 
**CVS source code control. 
**Bash scripting 
**Linux Admin 

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ 
About a career ReliaSource:
A career at ReliaSource is much more than a consulting opportunity. 
People who join our organization are joining one of the fastest 
growing providers of technology consulting services and solutions, 
and have the opportunity to apply their experience to challenging 
and rewarding opportunities where their contributions will be 
appreciated.
 
Our personnel include project managers, architects, mentors, 
analysts, designers, developers, configuration managers and 
quality engineers with relevant and real object technology 
experience. 
 
Technologies on tap include JAVA, C++, Smalltalk, J2EE, J2ME, 
WAP, CORBA, .Net, DCOM, Web Services, HTML, XML, ebXML, 
UML, RUP, XP, use cases, design/analysis and architectural patterns, 
reuse, frameworks, class testing and a host of others. 
 
We work with the strongest and most qualified consultants with 
experience in specific subject matters(telecom, finance, etc.)  and 
field multiple offers form the hottest companies.
=============================================
